name: Trash Run
description:
This is my first game made on GameMaker Studio 2. All of the assets except for the main character and fonts are made by other artists credited in the credits page.

Installing

Just unzip the file and it will create a folder named "Trash Run". Play it from there.

How to play

Collect trash before time runs out.

Note: Comments and feedback are very much appreciated! My top score is 10 in 60 seconds. Let me know if you achieve higher :D
